Returns: The encapsulated exception, or null if there is none.
getException().Description: Return the actual exception (if any) that caused this exception to be raised.

Parameters: Exception: The exception to be encapsulated in a TransformerFactoryConfigurationError.
TransformerFactoryConfigurationError(jav.Description: Create a new TransformerFactoryConfigurationError with a given Exception base cause of the error.

Parameters: Exception: The exception to be encapsulated in a TransformerFactoryConfigurationError
TransformerFactoryConfigurationError(jav.Description: Create a new TransformerFactoryConfigurationError with the given Exception base cause and detail message.

TransformerFactoryConfigurationError().Description: Create a new TransformerFactoryConfigurationError with no detail message.

getMessage().Description: Return the message (if any) for this error . If there is no message for the exception and there is an encapsulated exception then the message of that exception will be returned.

Parameters: String: The error message for the exception.
TransformerFactoryConfigurationError(jav.Description: Create a new TransformerFactoryConfigurationError with the String specified as an error message.

ClassDesc: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Transformer Factories exists. This error will typically be thrown when the class of a transformation factory specified in the system properties cannot be found or instantiated.
